FuncDef: This command configures the time for which a client stays in the lockout state during which authentication and ESM host creation is suppressed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the minimum lockout-time for this host lockout policy. Values-1 to 86400. ParamDefault: Default- 10 seconds
Specifies the maximum lockout-time for this host lockout policy. Values-1 to 86400. ParamDefault: Default- 3600 seconds
